description: A kind, cheerful, and helpful first year student who joins the Kendo Club. He was a member of his junior high school`s kendo club and had also attended the Kawazoe Dojo. He had reached the top eight in the prefectural games during junior high. He is almost on par with Tamaki in skill, and he has defeated Satori Azuma once. He also possesses considerable academic skill as he scored fourth out of all the Freshman on the regional exams.
name: Nakata Yuuji
